languages.text: {n}Друкари суживает глаза.{/n} "Творение Тервантьяса оказалось низкопробной подделкой, раз мираж не обуял тебя полностью... Даже если и так — какое тебе дело до того?"
{n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари суживает глаза.{/n} "Творение Тервантьяса оказалось низкопробной подделкой, раз мираж не обуял тебя полностью... Даже если и так — какое тебе дело до того?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"
{n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"
{n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"
{n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你竟然没有被幻象彻底迷惑，特万提亚斯的那条虫子肯定是个粗劣的仿制品……不过，就算你说的都是真的，这和你又有什么关系？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你竟然没有被幻象彻底迷惑，特万提亚斯的那条虫子肯定是个粗劣的仿制品……不过，就算你说的都是真的，这和你又有什么关系？”

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari plisse les yeux.{/n} « La création de Tervantias ne devait être qu'une pâle imitation si vous n'avez pas été totalement {mf|submergé|submergée} par le mirage... Et même si c'était vrai, qu'est-ce que ça peut bien vous faire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari plisse les yeux.{/n} « La création de Tervantias ne devait être qu'une pâle imitation si vous n'avez pas été totalement {mf|submergé|submergée} par le mirage... Et même si c'était vrai, qu'est-ce que ça peut bien vous faire ? »

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «La creación de Tervantias debe de haber sido una imitación de tercera si la ilusión no te ha abrumado... Aunque lo que dices sea cierto, ¿a ti qué te importa?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «La creación de Tervantias debe de haber sido una imitación de tercera si la ilusión no te ha abrumado... Aunque lo que dices sea cierto, ¿a ti qué te importa?».

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは目を細める。{/n}「お前が幻影に完全には圧倒されなかったというのなら、テルヴァンティアスの創造物は低級な模造品にすぎなかったのだろう…お前が言うことが本当だったとしても…何だというのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは目を細める。{/n}「お前が幻影に完全には圧倒されなかったというのなら、テルヴァンティアスの創造物は低級な模造品にすぎなかったのだろう…お前が言うことが本当だったとしても…何だというのだ？」

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Tervantias' Schöpfung muss eine billige Imitation gewesen sein, wenn das Trugbild Euch nicht völlig überwältigt hat ... Selbst, wenn Ihr die Wahrheit sagt — was schert es Euch?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Tervantias' Schöpfung muss eine billige Imitation gewesen sein, wenn das Trugbild Euch nicht völlig überwältigt hat ... Selbst, wenn Ihr die Wahrheit sagt — was schert es Euch?"

languages.text: {n}Drukhari gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "O illüzyonda tamamen kendinden geçmediğine göre Tervantias'ın hünerleri, epey kısıtlı olmalı... Diyelim ki dediklerin doğru... Peki bundan sana ne?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari narrows his eyes.{/n} "Tervantias's creation must have been a low-grade imitation if the mirage did not completely overwhelm you... Even if what you say is true — what is it to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "O illüzyonda tamamen kendinden geçmediğine göre, Tervantias'ın hünerleri epey kısıtlı olmalı... Diyelim ki dediklerin doğru... Peki bundan sana ne?"
